fullText:
NYC Events, Restaurants, Music, & Nightlife

Cititour.com is your guide to interesting places throughout New York City. Use our listings to locate restaurants, exciting clubs and nightlife, bars and pubs, shopping destinations, landmarks and parks; and shows, concerts, and other events too.

showScoreExcerpt: "A breathtaking production...The illusions are unlike anything seen on Broadway before."

llmScore.reasoning: [ensemble-majority] | 2/3 models agree: Rave | Claude: The excerpt describes the production as 'breathtaking' and claims the illusions are unprecedented on Broadway, indicating strong enthusiasm and recommendation. | GPT-4o: The review uses strong, enthusiastic language such as 'breathtaking' and 'unlike anything seen on Broadway before,' indicating a highly positive assessment of the production. | Gemini: The review excerpt describes the production as "breathtaking" and praises the illusions, indicating a positive recommendation, although the full context is missing.

textIssues: Show title not found in text
